content: Great app. Easy to use. Bought for my dyslexic son. He loves it.

Where is the text input??? What makes you foolish enough to believe that everyone wants to announce to the world around me. That I cannot spell every second word on a bad day?? I am deleting this app and getting a refund... Now cya
replyContent: Hi Noel, we are sorry you felt uncomfortable using the app. The app is designed to aid with spelling through voice recognition only. I believe there are apps available in the Play Store that may assist with text input. Hope you find a solution. Thank you

content: I can not get it to read back to me? I have it turned on in settings but nothing happens. Please help.
replyContent: Hi Karen - when you hit the hardware volume keys, a slider pops up with a settings icon next to it. Tapping on this icon allows you to change the Media Volume. Disable silent mode. Press "Power" button and hold it until a menu appears on the screen. Clear the "Silent Mode" check box in the menu to disable the Silent Mode option. Thank you

content: I've got this installed on my smartphone and it doesn't work properly.  It takes a while to process then says try again all the time.  Any ideas what the problem is? Worked the first time yeah
replyContent:
Hi Daniel - thank you for your message. Please make sure you have network connectivity or Wi-Fi connected and your microphone is turned on.

Alternatively uninstall and the app and reinstall a fresh version... Please let us know how you go. Thank you

content: As an education support staff, I introduced this app to my students with learning disabilities. The app is extremely easy to use and it has worked wonders in that my students are able to express their thoughts into writing with confidence. The handwriting option prompts them to write neatly as they transfer their ideas into their writing books. I highly recommend that the app is also made available offline.
replyContent: Thank you very much Ann for your review and 5 star rating and sharing with us how the app is helping your students in the classroom and with their writing confidence. We truly appreciate your support and recommendation.

content: Thanks so much for this fantastic app, I am severely dyslexic as is my 8 year old daughter, and this has helped us both so very much. She is at the age where she needs lots of help with homework, spellings, story writing etc. As she kept asking me " how do you spell.....?" I was struggling to help her as my spelling is not great. This app has changed both our lives, so now she just press's the mic and off she goes, she isn't very confident and uses a shy voice and  still this fab app gets it right every time. I have recommended it to school who will be using it too. If I had just one grumble it is that it's a shame there's no lines on the screen when using the coloured screen, I would have thought this essential for a learning child. But I would still give it 5 stars x
replyContent: Hi Andy - your feedback, review and recommendation is greatly appreciated. Thank you so much for sharing this with us. We will look at all available options as we continue to improve Easy Spelling Aid. We also have a dyslexia only version 'Easy Dyslexia Aid'. We would be more than happy to provide you with a free app promo code. Please contact us.

content: This is awesome but I'd like to use it at school and I don't have internet there so it's such a shame! Please work on making an offline version! Thanks! ðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ƒ
replyContent: Thank you Deljin for your feedback and suggestion. We will look at all available options as we continue to improve Easy Spelling Aid.

content: It worked perfectly when first installed two days ago but then could not get it to work. Have just reinstalled it and happy to say it is working again. Heaps of potential.
replyContent: Excellent - thank you Lyn for your feedback and review. Glad it all worked out for you. The app has come along way since 2015 - with countless improvements in the speech recognition technology and available options. Please make sure to always update the app to improve your experience. Thank you

content: I'm a primary school teacher and let kids use this to help with their spelling. Even with a chattering classroom the progran works well. Recommended!
replyContent: Thank you Fraser for your review and 5 star rating. Easy Spelling Aid is suitable for students of all ages, from 5 to 55 and beyond and is recommended by teachers for use individually or in a classroom setting.
